# alternates

**Instance Property**

An array of alternative actions to take for the command.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var alternates: [UICommandAlternate] { get }
```

## Getting command alternatives

- **UICommandAlternate**: An object representing an alternative action for a command.
